# Test init command help shows subcommands
exec grove init --help
stdout 'Initialize grove'
stdout 'Usage:'
stdout 'Available Commands:'
stdout 'new'
stdout 'convert'
! stderr .

# Test init command execution shows help
exec grove init
stdout 'Usage:'
! stderr .

# Test init rejects unknown subcommands
! exec grove init invalid
stderr '^âœ— unknown command "invalid" for "grove init"'
